mapper.insert: insert into office(oid, districtcode, oname, address, webaddress, phone, filename, contents, id) values((select nvl(max(oid),0)+1 from office),#{districtcode}, #{oname}, #{address}, #{webaddress},#{phone}, #{filename},#{contents},#{id})
mapper.update: update office set oname = #{oname}, address = #{address}, webaddress = #{webaddress}, phone = #{phone}, contents = #{contents}, filename= #{filename} where oid =#{oid}
